name: Sort It All (holudi)
description:
Find your inner peace through the power of sorting with Sort It All, the relaxing and enjoyable mobile sorting game. You'll be challenged to sort a variety of objects by color at your own pace. With simple gameplay and calming graphics, this game is the perfect way to de-stress and improve your problem-solving skills.

Features

  • 12 difficulties
  • Up to 19 different colors in one game
  • Themes for customization - Sort fruits, flags, balls, animals and seasonal items!
  • Calming music
  • Playable in Portrait and Landscape
